reviews.review: SO MANY fuking cheaters and community that is toxic as Chernobyl. But ppl still loves it so try it. You can have 5 pings by playing your local server or faceit groups. And Faceit has pretty reliable ANTI-CHEAT.
hermoso juego, lastima la gente que lo juega
came from the competitive MC Esports league and it was quite a seamless transition to become one of the top NA ranked CSGO players... $40/hour lessons dm me
Money pit plus it will make you a more angry person
one of the best multiplayer games out there.

i mean why would i put in the hours i have if i didnt like it
i know it says "be descriptive",  nut its csgo, 11/10 game
pretty fun surf=good actual game=hard but fun

This is the best gun fighting game in the world in my opinion because it needs strategy and skills together! it's not just a spraying gun fight like COD or sth. every gun has it's own pattern which you need to know and if you have no idea about them you're gonna have a hard time killing enemies! this game has 3 problems: cheaters, cheaters and cheatersss!!!
if you enjoy getting your balls foundle with play this game it is super fun if you hate yourself

if you like one of the following
1. mental torture
2. Russian people screaming
3. kids yelling slurs
4. hackers
5. never ranking up
then i highly recommend this game
So deveriam melhorar o anticheat e investir em servidores 128 tick
fun, lots of fun with friends
meu cs go nao esta abindo
its cs go it is what you expect it to be

I can't believe how this game has got to this point. There are so many hacks available for this game and Valve doesn't give a F' about it. Honestly, VAC is a joke. There is no point playing this game on official servers anymore. GLHF!

Vicia mais que crack, vai pra igreja que é melhor.
The best game in the world.
Un muy buen juego pero el problema son los hacker. Por el resto esta muy bueno.

This game is eternal. It´s simply the best shooter ever. Simple and fun , you can play it forever.
Sure there are better graphics and everything ... but there´s just something about CS that keeps you playing like no other game does. 

I've played CS for the first time in 1998 and it changed my life
i suck at the game but its fun w friends
Melhor jogo que já joguei na minha vida, parabéns aos desenvolvedores!!

Game is full of hackers, even in prime. Even at high ranks. This game went to shit and valve knows it, the only thing they care about is pro play, and even that is dwindling. NA cs is dead, EU cs is slowly dying. This game will die if valve doesn't fix the cheater problem, its a shame that you must resort to using 3rd party clients like ESEA or FACEIT to have a reliable matchmaknig experience, this game is trash.
Valorant is better due to Anti Cheat
As vezes bom as vezes ruim depende da atualização. As vezes ta cheio de xiter mas se você gosta de passar raiva e meter o louco dando bala nos outros esse jogo é perfeito.
low trust is worse than death
I bought it and now it's free. Fantastic.
